text: @atrupar “...Make progress on putting the coronavirus pandemic on the past...” @VP makes it clear that the juvenile position of the Trump Administration is that the virus is done and we can’t see it so it’s not a threat. #disinfectantDonnie doesn’t have the patience of an adult! (1/2)
